snippet: Prosecutors planned to investigate possible sexual abuse at Deerfield Academy in Massachusetts after it released a report that detailed allegations against two faculty members who taught there for decades.
abstract: Prosecutors plan to investigate possible sexual abuse at Deerfield Academy, exclusive private boarding school in western Massachusetts, after a report is released by the school confirming that Peter Hindle, mathematics teacher who worked at Deerfield from 1956 to 2000, engaged in sexual conduct with at least one student.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors planned to investigate possible sexual abuse at Deerfield Academy in Massachusetts after it released a report that detailed allegations against two faculty members who taught there for decades.

headline.seo: Massachusetts to Study Sex Abuse Charges at Deerfield Academy
headline.main: Abuse Charge at Exclusive Boarding School Stirs Inquiry
headline.print_headline: Abuse Charge At Academy Stirs Inquiry
